long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Torn Loadouts, your ultimate companion for seamless strategy and preparation on Torn.com! Say goodbye to the hassle of jotting down enemy loadouts and gear details manually. Our extension revolutionizes your gaming experience by automatically caching and sharing this crucial information within your faction, right on the Torn.com webpage.

Key Features:

Effortless Loadout Tracking: No more tedious tasks of opening extra spreadsheets and typing in data. Torn Loadouts seamlessly integrates into the Torn.com interface, streamlining your gaming process.

Official API Integration: Powered by Torn.com's official API, our extension provides you with comprehensive insights into enemy armor details. Uncover the mysteries of your opponents' loadouts and gear, and gain a tactical advantage with precise information.

Ranked War Perks Unveiled: Explore the battlefield with a new level of understanding. Torn Loadouts reveals the specific Ranked War bonuses associated with each enemy's armor, empowering you to make informed decisions before engaging in combat.

Offline Attack Settings: Stay one step ahead by accessing your adversaries' offline attack settings. Torn Loadouts equips you with the intelligence needed to devise strategic plans and optimize your attacks.

Critical Hit Rate Analysis: Maximize your combat efficiency by understanding the critical hit rates of your opponents. Torn Loadouts delivers crucial data on critical hit probabilities, allowing you to fine-tune your strategy for optimal results.

Faction Collaboration: Foster teamwork and coordination within your faction. Torn Loadouts facilitates the seamless sharing of cached enemy loadouts, creating a united front against your rivals.

Battle Timer Planning: Get a head start on your adversaries by planning and preparing your attacks well before the battle timer begins. Torn Loadouts empowers you to strategize effectively, ensuring you're always one step ahead in the intense world of Torn.com.

Upgrade your gaming experience with Torn Loadouts and embark on a journey where preparation meets victory. Dominate the battlefield with unparalleled insights and a strategic edge that sets you apart from the competition. Download Torn Loadouts now and elevate your Torn.com gameplay to new heights!
